group_1.textCenter: Okay...let's change our perspective!@Maybe we can do it without using an arch...!

group_1.textRight: ...What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: I mean...
All we need is something else to be the face@of the school festival!
...The face of the school festival?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
Something that stands out at the school gate@that tells people we're having a school festival.
The face of the school festival!

group_1.textLeft: You know what the face of the school festival@should be?!

group_1.textRight: Let me think...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I got it!

group_1.textRight: ...What did you get?
You're a member of the student council, so@you're good at organizing people, right?

group_1.textLeft: It's not my strong suit, but I can if I must...

group_1.textRight: Then lead others to take down the arch!
It'll only get in the way if it stays here...

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, you're correct... It would be quite@inconvenient to repair it right here.

group_1.textRight: Then please take care of this! I'll go negotiate!
Negotiate... What are you planning to do?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps she has a great idea...
Let's trust Tsumugi here!

group_1.textRight: Oh, Tsumugi...

group_1.textLeft: Hiii there!

group_1.textRight: I have a request for you, Sayuki-senpai...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh...? For me...?

group_1.textRight: Be the face of the school festival!

group_1.textLeft: The face of the school festival...?

group_1.textRight: I was thinking...if the arch is broken, then...
We just need a face to replace the arch!

group_1.textLeft: Ummm...you want me to be a face?

group_1.textRight: Yes, because...
You're the idol of Mizuna!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hwaaah...?
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Sayuki, a local idol of Mizuna, is the face of@Mizuna...
Sayuki, the face of Mizuna, is the face of@Mizuna Girls' Academy...
...Is that what you're saying?

group_1.textRight: Yes! Mayu-senpai, you're sharp!
Please, just give me some of your free time,@Sayuki-senpai...!

group_1.textLeft: If it's for the school festival, I'm willing to do it,@but...
Is it really okay for me to do it?

group_1.textRight: There's nobody except you who could be called@the face of Mizuna...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Okaaay! I can't say no if you say sooo!

group_1.textRight: Thank you!
I'll go talk to the senior members of the@committee and the chairperson right away!
...And it went through?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, the chairperson said...
"If we're going to make someone hand out@flyers, we may as well pick someone famous..."

group_1.textRight: ...Must be tiring dealing with all these troubles...
I'll send her some food next time...
